Verses: 1 appozhudhu Raajaavaagiya Thariyu Itta Kattalaiyinpadiye Baabilon Kajaanaavilulla Thasthira Araiyai Sodhiththaargal.
2 medhiya Seemaiyilirukkira Akmedhaa Pattanaththin Aramanaiyile Oru Surul Agappattadhu; Adhile Ezhudhiyirundha Vibaramaavadhu:

3 raajaavaagiya Koresin Mudhalaam Varushaththil, Kores Raajaa Erusalemilirundha Dhevaalayaththaikkuriththup Pirappiththa Uththaravu Ennavendraal: Dhevaalayamaanadhu Paliseluththappattuvandha Sthaanaththile Kattappadakkadavadhu; Adhin Asthibaarangal Balamaayiruppadhaaga; Adhu Arubadhu Muzha Uyaramum, Arubadhu Muzha Agalamumaayirukkavendum.
4 adhu Moondru Varisai Perunkarkalaalum, Oru Machchu Varisai Pudhu Uththirangalaalum Kattappadakkadavadhu; Adharku Sellum Selavu Raajaavin Aramanaiyilirundhu Kodukkappaduvadhaaga.

5 andriyum Nebugaadhnechchaar Erusalemilirundha Aalayaththilirundhu Eduththu, Baabilonukkuk Konduvandha Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukkaduththapon Vellip Panimuttugal Erusalemilulla Dhevaalayamaagiya Thangal Sthaanaththirkup Poi Serumpadikkuth Thirumbak Koduk
